jobDescription: OverviewIn partnership with NYC Health + Hospitals/Coney Island, our teams accommodate more than 250,000 outpatient visits, more than 89,000 emergency room visits, and with 371 beds, more than 15,000 inpatient admissions annually. The hospital maintains a strong academic affiliation with SUNY Downstate Medical Center and New York College of Osteopathic Medicine in order to maintain its high standards of healthcare delivery.ResponsibilitiesUnder general direction, performs or directly supervises the provision of the professional general or specialty medical work of ordinary difficulty. Performs all related work. Function/Clinical/Responsibilities:Demonstrates knowledge of the Privacy and Security rules outlined in the HIPAA guideline.Successfully complete the mandatory one day HIPAA Training.Adheres and conforms to all hospital and departmental guidelines, policies and procedures.Examines patients, orders or performs appropriate diagnostic tests.Formulates diagnosis, directs or preforms appropriate therapeutic treatment and counsels patients.Consults with other members of the professional staff.Gives guidance and direction to the house staff and other members of the healthcare team.Provides guidance and participates in the teaching of house staff, in staff conferences, and in research projects as directed.Advises the less experienced members of the professional medical staff.Plans, organizes and directs the operation of a major segment within a medical service or medical program in a hospital or similar health facility; or assists the Chief of Service in the planning, organizing and directing of the entire medical service or medical program.Assists in the administration and coordination of the service.Assists int he establishment and maintenance of standards of performance for Physicians and other professional employees working in the service.Performs other administrative, professional, consultative duties as needed by the Chief of Service.Participates in medical research.Prepares daily work log as required.Adheres to the departmental attendance policy.All other duties as required by the department.
